scripts.build-assets: npm run make-dirs && npm run copy-bootstrap && npm run copy-jquery && npm run copy-datatables && npm run copy-datatables-dt && npm run copy-fontawesome-woff2 && npm run copy-fontawesome-css && npm run copy-fontawesome-solid-css
scripts.copy-datatables: cp -r node_modules/datatables.net/js/ ufastauthd3/assets/ && cp -r node_modules/datatables.net/types/ ufastauthd3/assets/
scripts.copy-datatables-dt: cp -r node_modules/datatables.net-dt/js/ ufastauthd3/assets/ && cp -r node_modules/datatables.net-dt/css/ ufastauthd3/assets/ && cp -r node_modules/datatables.net-dt/types/ ufastauthd3/assets/
